item.title: Europe Nears U.S. Trade Deal, but Stands Ready to Retaliate
item.description: Nearly every member of the European Union supports a plan to hit back against President Trump’s tariffs if no agreement is reached.

item.title: Appeals Court Blocks California’s Background Checks for Ammunition Buyers
item.description: The law violates the Second Amendment, a panel of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit ruled in a 2-1 decision.
